name: Broccoli and Chicken Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1 pound boneless chicken thighs, cut in bite-size pieces
2 packets True Orange or other orange flavoring equal to about 2 tablespoons orange juice
2 tablespoons granular Splenda or equivalent liquid sweetener

instructions.en: Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken; cook until done, stirring occasionally, about 6 minutes.
Mix sauce ingredients in a small bowl.
Microwave broccoli florets in a covered casserole for 2 minutes on HIGH.
Mix ginger and xanthan gum in a small bowl.
Add vegetables and remaining ingredients to cooked chicken. Cook and stir until heated through and sauce has thickened (if using xanthan gum).

notes: Makes 3 servings. You can use a mixture of broccoli florets, carrots and snow peas instead of just broccoli. The original recipe called for 1 tablespoon of sesame oil.
